meanings.definition: The act of applying ink to a surface.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy inking my drawings to make them stand out.
meanings.sent2: The artist's inking of the comic book characters was impressive.
meanings.sent3: Inking a paper with colorful ink can make it look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her inking of the design on the wall transformed the room into an art gallery.
meanings.sent5: The inking on the parchment was so vibrant that it seemed to come alive.

meanings.definition: The process of printing with ink.
meanings.sent1: The inking of newspapers is done using large printing machines.
meanings.sent2: Inking is an essential step in the production of books and magazines.
meanings.sent3: The inking process in the factory is like a colorful dance of machines.
meanings.sent4: The inking of the logo on the packaging made it look professional.
meanings.sent5: Watching the inking of the illustrations was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The act of signing or endorsing a document with ink.
meanings.sent1: Inking the contract with a signature makes it legally binding.
meanings.sent2: The inking of the will was witnessed by a notary public.
meanings.sent3: She enjoyed inking her autograph on the fan's poster.
meanings.sent4: The inking of the official document marked the end of negotiations.
meanings.sent5: The inking of the decree was the final step in the process.
